casebody.data:
Ann Campion et al. v. Kathleen S. Shields et al. (10123)

Daly, Landau and Heiman, Js.

Argued February 25 decision released March 17, 1992 *904William F. Gallagher, with whom, on the brief, were Richard L. Goldhlatt and Cynthia C. Bott, for the appellant (named plaintiff). Terence A. Zemetis, with whom, on the brief, was Edward T. Falsey, for the appellee (named defendant). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
